data_table.description: This data table contains subject IDs, consent group information, subject aliases, and 22q.11.2 deletion syndrome case control status.

variable.name: CONSENT
variable.description: Consent group as determined by DAC

variable.name: SOURCE_SUBJECT_ID
variable.description: Subject ID used in the Source Repository

variable.name: AFFECTION_STATUS
variable.description: 22q11DS case control status of the subject
